subtitle: [Music]
the grandfather of Noah witnessed it all
I saw the sons of Heaven break their
sacred Oaths their descent bringing ruin
upon the Earth they taught mankind the
Arts of war the forging of weapons the
reading of stars and forbidden wisdom
long concealed in the heavens the
balance was shattered and Chaos
rained long ago before the great flood
the children of Heaven came down from
their Heavenly Abode taking the
beautiful daughters of men as their own
and with them bore monstrous Giants
creatures neither man nor God when the
Nephilim walked the Earth their presence
was a curse upon mankind towering Giants
monstrous in form and insatiable in
their hunger they ruled over humans with
cruelty beyond measure the sons of the
Watchers were born of unnatural unions
their strength greater than any mortal
could fathom their appetites darker than
any man could
comprehend oh lord of the heavens
